body.p: Zoomable lighttable layout inherits from most the filemanager features, with some noticeable changes :
Scroll with your mouse wheel to zoom in and out. Moving the mouse while pressing the left mouse buttonallows you to navigate through your collection.
To locate where you are in a collection, there are indicators at the extreme borders of the window: left/right and top/bottom for your vertical and your horizontal position, respectively.
